name: Modern Tradition #08
description:
8th artwork from the "Modern Tradition" collection
In these works, I was inspired by the traditional Iranian painting "Miniature / Gol o Morgh". This style of painting uses different flowers and birds, which are often decorative and have been used on the cover of books, boxes, paper, etc.
In these works, I have done traditional Iranian painting in the form of modern illustration with digital painting technique.
